mapper.select: select z.id, z.director_name, z.director_post_url, m.movie_post_url as director_debut_url from movie m, ( select d.*, md.movie_id from director d, movie_director md where d.id = md.director_id ) z where m.id = z.movie_id order by z.id asc, m.movie_rating desc

select z.id, z.actor_name, z.actor_post_url, m.movie_post_url as actor_debut_url from movie m, ( select a.*, ma.movie_id from actor a, movie_actor ma where a.id = ma.actor_id ) z where m.id = z.movie_id order by z.id asc, m.movie_rating desc
mapper.insert: insert into director values ( ( select coalesce ( max ( id ), 0 ) + 1 from director ), #{director_name}, #{director_post_url} )
insert into actor values ( ( select coalesce ( max ( id ), 0 ) + 1 from actor ), #{actor_name}, #{actor_post_url} )
mapper.select: select id, director_name, director_post_url from director where id = #{director_id}
select id, actor_name, actor_post_url from actor where id = #{actor_id}
mapper.update: update director set director_name = #{director_name}, director_post_url = #{director_post_url} where id = #{id}
update actor set actor_name = #{actor_name}, actor_post_url = #{actor_post_url} where id = #{id}
